properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus I love Thee Not because I hope for heav'n there-by Nor yet because if I love not I must forever die{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I love Thee Savior dear and still I ever will love Thee Solely because my God Thou art Who first hast loved me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}For me to lowest depths of woe Thou didst Thyself abase For me didst bear The cross and shame And manifold disgrace{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}For me didst Suffer pains unknown Blood-sweat and agony Yea death itself all all for me Who was Thine enemy{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Then why O blessed Savior mine Should I not love Thee well Not for the sake Of winning heaven Nor of escaping hell{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Not with The hope of gaining aught Nor seeking a reward But freely fully as Thyself Hast loved me O Lord{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}E'en so I love Thee And will love And in Thy praise will sing Solely because Thou art my God And my eternal King{/lang-eng}
